Key Match Events: Bailey Ober turned in one of the best outings of his season, rolling through the Royals and sending down 15 straight batters to finish his start.
Post-Match Reflections: The Twins have gotten all too familiar with excruciating losses in recent weeks.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins starter Bailey Ober was lifted after seven shutout innings.
Others: The Twins lost the game despite Bailey Ober's impressive performance.
